channel.title: Excuse to not clean up my room!
channel.description:
Does anybody know a [b][u]GOOD[/u][/b] excuse to not clean up your/my room. Because my dad is retarted about keeping my house "spick 'n' clean". And every weekend he forces me and my sister to clean up. Now i need a good excuse to not clean up my room. Can anybody please think of one or two and maybe even three or more.
Please do [b][u]NOT[/u][/b] use these excuses as they're too obvious: [ul][*] "Oh, i am sick! Well, looks like i can't clean up my room"[/ul]
And that's all. Please do inlcude any excuses that contain Sick.
Thank you all for your help! Dudeofthed!

item.title: Excuse to not clean up my room!
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

[quote=“dudeofthed, post:16, topic:87377”][quote author=Pookey71 link=topic=128051.msg1243513#msg1243513 date=1177946677]

Grow up, IMO. How about you keep it clean in the first place?
[/quote]But i play in my room a lot whenever i am bored. And leave it a mess mostly. Usually lazy. AND I AM GROWN UP!

Then take some time to CLEAN UP the mess you made in the time you played instead of letting it grow.

I have a good excuse say “LIKE I R OWN YOU !!!11” and they will shut up,don’t like it run away.

I’ll use this one, thanks Pookiey71.
Do not forget, you can still post more for me and you to use.

@XxKanexX
I am allergic to cleaning up my room and i get nowhere when i start.[br][size=1]Posted on: 30-04-2007, 04:27:52[/size][hr][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=128051.msg1243519#msg1243519 date=1177946816]

Grow up, IMO. How about you keep it clean in the first place?
[/quote]But i play in my room a lot whenever i am bored. And leave it a mess mostly. Usually lazy. AND I AM GROWN UP!

Then take some time to CLEAN UP the mess you made in the time you played instead of letting it grow.

I have a good excuse say “LIKE I R OWN YOU !!!11” and they will shut up,don’t like it run away.

How you got 24 rep is beyond me.

Do not speak of the word “rep”. It is ok by me, but maybe not to other admins/moderators.[/quote]
you can talk about rep just not ask for it

Read full topic

item.title: Excuse to not clean up my room!
item.dc:creator: @juessx juessx
item.description:
@juessx wrote:

Clean your god damn room! Reading this just pisses me off, wow. You must be one of those spoiled bratty kids…

Here`s some suggestions on how to clean your house:

  1. When you finish doing something clean it up. (takes 1 - 3 minutes?).
  2. Organize all your shit.
  3. Slap youself for being your pa and ma’s naughty child.
  4. Clean up whenever you finish doing something : eating, anything…
  5. Instead of playing, try studying… What have you been playing to much? Your action figures, WII, ect? Rich kid…

Read full topic
